typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> moviesCosmos
moviesCosmos alterRow(deleteIf(titlekey == 'Wanted')) ~> DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy sink(input(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/titlekey'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		movies,
		titlekey,
		id
	)) ~> sink1
